# getCID() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getCID(
  content: ContentWithPath[],
  wrapWithDirectory?: boolean,
  cidVersion?: CIDVersion,
): Promise<string>;
```

| Parameter         | Type                | Description  |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | ------------ |
| content           | ContentWithPath\[\] |              |
| wrapWithDirectory | boolean             | _(Optional)_ |
| cidVersion        | CIDVersion          | _(Optional)_ |
